sentences.en: Drug addiction soon played havoc with his career.
sentences.cn: 毒瘾很快就毁掉了他的事业。

sentences.en: He points out that some past offenders in Michigan have been released only to cause havoc and end up in jail again.
sentences.cn: 他指出，过去密歇根释放的一些犯人只是与造成严重破坏的人有关，而且最后又都重新回到监狱里。

sentences.en: Miserable food, ill - timed and greedily eaten , had played havoc with bone and muscle.
sentences.cn: 粗劣的食物, 吃得不定时,而且吃起来又是狼吞虎咽, 严重地损害了他们骨骼和肌肉.

sentences.en: No matter how soft the light is, it still plays havoc, fading carpets and curtains in every room.
sentences.cn: 无论多么柔和的光线，也仍然会造成损害，会让所有房间的地毯和窗帘褪色。

sentences.en: Rain has continued to play havoc with sporting events.
sentences.cn: 下雨一直影响着体育比赛的进行。

sentences.en: Regrettably, it is also in these 100 years that humanity has experienced unprecedented hardships, particularly the havoc of the two world wars.
sentences.cn: 令人遗憾的是，人类在这100年中也经历了前所未有的苦难，特别是遭受了两次世界大战的浩劫。

sentences.en: Rioters caused havoc in the centre of the town.
sentences.cn: 暴乱分子在市中心制造了极大混乱。

sentences.en: Stress can wreak havoc on the immune system.
sentences.cn: 压力可能会破坏免疫系统。

sentences.en: The bad weather played havoc with our plans.
sentences.cn: 天气恶劣把我们的计画打乱了.

sentences.en: The floods caused havoc throughout the area.

sentences.en: The foxes play havoc with the wildfowl.
sentences.cn: 狐狸把那里的野鸟可折腾坏了.

sentences.en: The sudden onset of winter caused havoc with rail and air transport.
sentences.cn: 冬天的突然降临让铁路和航空运输系统陷入混乱。

sentences.en: The weather played havoc with airline schedules.

sentences.en: These chemically active ferments cause havoc.

sentences.en: They had to rebuild their homes after the havoc of the hurricane.
sentences.cn: 遭受飓风的巨大破坏后,他们不得不重建家园.

sentences.en: They have wreaked dreadful havoc among the wildlife by shooting and trapping.
sentences.cn: 他们射杀和诱捕野生动物,造成了严重的破坏.

sentences.en: This concentration of airborne firepower wrought havoc with the enemy forces.
sentences.cn: 这次机载火力的集中攻击给敌军造成很大破坏.

sentences.en: Whatever the havoc so far, the hull was holding.
sentences.cn: 不管到目前为止这场浩劫多大, 艇壳还是经受住了.
